channel.title: Features on Aspose.Cells Product Family
channel.description: Recent content in Features on Aspose.Cells Product Family

item.title: Multiple Format Support
item.description: With Aspose.Cells for SharePoint you can convert documents between many popular office document formats from a SharePoint document library. Most of the conversions are done with high fidelity and precision. Supported Input Formats Aspose.Cells for SharePoint supports the following input formats: XLS – Microsoft Excel 97~2003 XLSX – Office Open XML XLSM, XLTX, XLTM – Office Open XML CSV – Comma Separated Values Worksheet Document ODS – OpenDocument XML – Microsoft Excel SpreadsheetML To generate documents, Aspose.

item.title: World Class Free Technical Support
item.description: Aspose is renowned for its free and unlimited technical support provided directly by the developers of the products. If a new version of a product is available, or if resolving a question results in a fix, all new releases are free if you have an active subscription. Getting Support Forums Aspose’s Support Forums is the place not only to resolve technical issues, but to participate in discussions with the vibrant and growing community of Aspose users.

item.title: Conversion Options
item.description: To make the conversion process as flexible as possible, Aspose.Cells for SharePoints allows you to set options that define how the converted file will be treated. Options The following options are available during conversion: Concatenate Files Select Combine Files to combine files that were originally in different formats into one, single document. This option is available when you select a folder, or several individual files, for conversion. Move documents in the list up or down to set the order in which you want the documents to be combined.

item.title: Previewing document
item.description: Aspose.Cells for Share Point supports previewing documents directly from SharePoint. The following formats support preview: XLS – Microsoft Excel 97 - 2003 XLSX – Office Open XML XLSM, XLTX, XLTM – Office Open XML XML – Microsoft Excel SpreadsheetML **Selecting a document to preview ** **Document preview from within a SharePoint library ** Attachments: previewing_doc1.png (image/png) previewing_doc2.png (image/png) previewing_doc3.png (image/png)

item.title: Aspose Tools Toolbar - only supported in SharePoint 2010
item.description: Aspose.Cells for SharePoint provides a toolbar that includes some valuable options and commands: Convert with Aspose.Cells Preview Document with Aspose.Cells Search in Document with Aspose.Cells Add Watermark with Aspose.Cells Add Footer with Aspose.Cells The Aspose.Cells toolbar Attachments: aspose_tools.png (image/png) tools1.png (image/png)

item.title: Search in a Document
item.description: Aspose.Cells for SharePoint supports searches in documents stored in SharePoint sites. Aspose.Cells for Share Point supports the following input formats to preview documents: XLS – Microsoft Excel 97 - 2003 XLSX – Office Open XML XLSM, XLTX, XLTM – Office Open XML XML - Microsoft Excel SpreadsheetML To search in a document: Select a document or folder you want to search. Right-click and select Search in Document with Aspose.

item.title: Add Watermark to Excel document
item.description: Aspose.Cells for SharePoint supports to add Watermark to Excel spreadsheets. Attachments: addwatermark1.png (image/png)

item.title: Add Footer to Excel document
item.description: Aspose.Cells for SharePoint supports to add footer in Excel spreadsheet. Attachments: addfooter1.png (image/png)
